Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Stunning \Stun"ning\, a. 1. Overpowering consciousness; overpowering the senses; especially, overpowering the sense of hearing; confounding with noise. [1913 Webster]
2. Striking or overpowering with astonishment, especially on account of excellence; as, stunning poetry. [Slang] --C. Kingsley. -- {Stun"ning*ly}, adv. [Slang] [1913 Webster]
stunningly adv : in a spectacular manner; "the area was spectacularly scenic" [syn: {spectacularly}]
